document_data.name: Orvustia Esseren
document_data.mainbody: '''Orvustia Esseren''' was a guard on the [[Sword Coast]] just before the [[Tyranny of Dragons]].
document_data.Personality: The guard was smart, tough, and talented with her [[bow]] and [[spear]] but knew nothing of the ''[[Realms]]'' outside her homeland.
document_data.History: Around [[1489 DR]], Orvustia followed the advice of her aunt and left her home on a farm near [[Baldur's Gate]] to see the world. She found work as a guard for a great caravan that, unknown to her, was full of [[Cult of the Dragon]] agents transporting treasures for the [[Hoard of the Dragon Queen]].
